original_text: Do not be afraid when you go out to fight a war against your enemies. You may see that their armies have more horses, chariots and soldiers than you have. Do not be afraid of them! Remember that the Lord your God is with you. He rescued you from Egypt.
korean_text: 네가 나가서 적군과 싸우려 할 때에 말과 병거와 백성이 너보다 많음을 볼지라도 그들을 두려워하지 말라 애굽 땅에서 너를 인도하여 내신 네 하나님 여호와께서 너와 함께 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: Do not be afraid when you go out to fight a war
You may see that their armies have more horses, chariots and soldiers than you have
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말과 병거가 너보다 많은 것을 볼지라도

sentences.original_text: Do not be afraid of them!
Remember that the Lord your God is with you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 하나님 여호와께서 너와 함께 계심을 기억하라
그가 너를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨음이라
